price: Reci: “Sve zagovorništvo pripada Allahu, vlast na nebesima i na Zemlji Njegova je, a poslije – Njemu ćete se vratiti.”
arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul lillahi al-shafāʿatu jamīʿan lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
